about_the_game:
Story
You will take on the role of Brams, a young apprentice from the House of Corvin, one of Esos' most affluent and renowned families of explorers.

You set out on a search mission for your missing parents when all of a sudden you found yourself in a place called Ikarus.

You will discover the truth about your parents, your ancestry, and the hidden wonders of the world along your quest.

Will you be able to go back to Esos, or will you be stuck there for all time?


***Players will experience travelling between two worlds and has an option which skills they will use to help them progress the game.***

ASTRAL WORLD EXPLORATION


Activate a Key Stone to travel back and forth between the Main world and Astral Realm




Astral World will have:
• New Level layout for player to explore.
• New Enemies and Bosses
• New Hidden treasures / relics


ASTRAL ENEMIES

MIX AND MATCH SKILL COMBAT




Combat system will have a Mix and Match Skill Combo that lets the player create their own playing style. Players will need to acquire this skills by finding hidden rooms, boss fights, side quest and crafting.


A Wonderful Wicked World


The Kingdom of Aden in Ikarus will serve as the backdrop for the action, a land rich in magic.

It will include a vast network of interconnected biomes, each with its unique biodiversity of flora and wildlife.




Game Features:
• Side Scroller game with hand drawn animation
• Explore the parallel world of Ikarus and discover the hidden dimension of Astral world, a bridge between Ikarus and Esos (MC’s World)
• Collect materials to upgrade your weapon or to create relics.
• Use your steampunk equipment to navigate the world. Tread each route carefully as you may encounter hidden rooms and secrets along the way.
• Over 100+ enemies to battle! From the undead to bizarre looking creatures living in the majestic world of Ikarus.
• Forge your destiny to become one of the legendary master of your kind and to discover the dark past of your bloodline.
• Complete the Void Stone to unlock the mystery of the Ember tree and to discover the true path.
• Custom painted landscape with alluring parallax to cater the story of each environment.

Shyftrs Website

Visit our website to see major updates about the game and our future plans on the Update / Blog section.




The team has been working non-stop. Our first objective was to obtain an initial funds to push the development of Shyftrs, and we were successful in receiving funding from CODE Dunedin last December 2022. We are incredibly thankful of the CODE team's assistance in guiding Shyftrs.

short_description: Shyftrs is a 2D stylized action adventure metroidvania game that will take you on a journey to uncover the mysteries of your lineage and the world beyond. Your weapon of choice are Cane Sword, Pistol or use your new found prowess. Step up and embrace the adventure.
